name: Machine Learning for absolute beginners
title: Machine Learning for absolute beginners
description: Learn the basics of machine learning, including key algorithms and practical applications, in this beginner-friendly course on Udemy.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning, including svm and decision trees to build real-world models using Python on Udacity.

name: Machine Learning Foundation:Probability
title: Machine Learning Foundation:Probability
description: Learn essential probability concepts like distributions and Bayesian inference to strengthen your machine learning foundation on LinkedIn Learning.

name: Machine Learning Foundation:Statistics
title: Machine Learning Foundation:Statistics
description: Learn key statistical concepts,  to build a strong foundation in machine learning on LinkedIn Learning.

name: Machine Learning Foundation:Calculus
title: Machine Learning Foundation:Calculus
description: Learn key calculus concepts, such as derivatives and gradients, and their application in machine learning algorithms on LinkedIn Learning.

name: ML for beginners
title: ML for beginners
description: Learn the basics of machine learning with SoloLearn's free beginner course. Perfect for anyone starting their AI journey!

name: Applied Machine Learning:Algorithms
title: Applied Machine Learning:Algorithms
description: Learn essential machine learning algorithms and how to apply them to real-world problems on LinkedIn Learning.

name: Supervised Machine Learning:Regression and Classification
title: Supervised Machine Learning:Regression and Classification
description: Master supervised machine learning techniques, including regression and classification algorithms, in this paid course on Coursera.

name: Supervised learning with scikit-learn
title: Supervised learning with scikit-learn
description: Learn the fundamentals of supervised learning and how to implement algorithms using scikit-learn in this free course on DataCamp.

name: Unsupervised Learning in Python
title: Unsupervised Learning in Python
description: Learn the basics of unsupervised learning, including clustering and dimensionality reduction, using Python in this free course on DataCamp.

name: Unsupervised Algorithms in Machine Learning
title: Unsupervised Algorithms in Machine Learning
description: Explore unsupervised learning techniques, including clustering and dimensionality reduction, in this course on Coursera.

name: Complete Machine Learning Project for Absolute Beginners
title: Complete Machine Learning Project for Absolute Beginners
description: Learn to build a machine learning project from scratch with this YouTube tutorial for absolute beginners. Get hands-on experience with basic concepts and practical implementation.

name: Build Your First Machine Learning Project
title: Build Your First Machine Learning Project
description: Learn how to build your first machine learning project with this YouTube beginner walkthrough. Gain step-by-step guidance on implementing key machine learning concepts.

name: End-to-End Machine Learning Project
title: End-to-End Machine Learning Project
description: Learn to complete an end-to-end machine learning project on YouTube, covering data preparation, model building, and deployment. Gain practical experience in real-world applications.
